column1: #Put IDs of hullmods you don't want to be randomized onto enemies by Antagonism rule.
#Mostly exists to avoid bothering modders with fixing issues that shouldn't even get surfaced with hullmods that are only available to player normally.

#Hullmods pass a bunch of checks before they can be added by Antagonism to a ship in following order: Is hullmod applicable? Does hullmod cost more than 0 OP? Is it not a logistic hullmod? Is it not hidden? Is it not hidden everywhere?

column2: if all of them are true
column3: does hullmod count as applicable with Antagonism. If it causes issues or doesn't make sense to be applied even after all that
column4: then hullmod deserves to be blacklisted.
